author: bodewig
msg: Rework ids attribute for <depend> to use a space separated list to
more closely match NAMES production of DTD.

author: bodewig
msg: Make Xalan build failures less fatal.

author: bodewig
msg: Make the sandbox projects that use Maven buildable.
Untested until we get the Xalan-J people to commit all their sources 8-(

author: bodewig
msg: Add a new ids attribute to <depend> to allow a project to depend only
on a subset of jars of a different project.
Use that in projects depending on JAXP and export xalan.jar in JAXP as well

author: bodewig
msg: This will trigger a bug in Ant's main branch, that has been fixed in
the 1.5 branch a few minutes ago.
